concept.title: Referencing Field Names
concept.shortdesc: Stages display a field name with a preceding slash as follows: /<field name>. For example, a field named CITY displays as /CITY.

conbody.p: Generally, you can select fields from a list. When a list is not available, use a preceding slash when you reference a field name.

For example, the following Expression processor replaces values in the "first" field. The Expression Configuration Field property requires you to enter the field name manually with the preceding slash. The Required Fields property provides a list of fields to select from.
